1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include <interactive_robot_hand/Gripper.h>
3 #include <interactive_robot_hand/HandState.h>
4 #include <visualization_msgs/Marker.h>
5 #include <stdio.h>

7 using namespace visualization;
8 
9 Gripper::Gripper() : Node() {
10 
11  // Create publisher and subscriber
12  publisher = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("/joint_states", 10);
13  subscriber = nh.subscribe<interactive_robot_hand::HandState>("/hand/state", 1, &Gripper::grip, this);
14  current_base_joint_pos = -0.785;
15  current_top_joint_pos = 0.489;
16 
17 }
18 
19 Gripper::~Gripper() {
20 
21 }
22 
23 void Gripper::grip(const interactive_robot_hand::HandState::ConstPtr& hand_state) {
24 
25  // Compute new joint positions based on the hand state
26  float wanted_base_joint_pos = -0.110; // max: 0.087
27  float wanted_top_joint_pos = 1.431; // max: 1.431
28  if(hand_state->open) {
29  wanted_base_joint_pos = -0.785;
30  wanted_top_joint_pos = 0.489;
31  }
32 
33  // Animate the joints
34  int hertz = 30;
35  ros::Rate loop(hertz);
36  float start_base_joint_pos = current_base_joint_pos;
37  float start_top_joint_pos = current_top_joint_pos;
38  for(int i=1; i<=hertz/2; i++) {
39  current_base_joint_pos = start_base_joint_pos + i*(wanted_base_joint_pos - start_base_joint_pos)/(hertz/2);
40  current_top_joint_pos = start_top_joint_pos + i*(wanted_top_joint_pos - start_top_joint_pos)/(hertz/2);
41  update_joints(current_base_joint_pos, current_top_joint_pos);
42  loop.sleep();
43  }
44 
45 }
46 
47 void Gripper::update_joints(float base_rotation, float top_rotation) {
48  joint_state.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
49  joint_state.name.resize(6);
50  joint_state.position.resize(6);
51  joint_state.name[0] ="f1_finger_basejoint";
52  joint_state.position[0] = base_rotation;
53  joint_state.name[1] ="f2_finger_basejoint";
54  joint_state.position[1] = base_rotation;
55  joint_state.name[2] ="f3_finger_basejoint";
56  joint_state.position[2] = base_rotation;
57  joint_state.name[3] ="f1_finger_topjoint";
58  joint_state.position[3] = top_rotation;
59  joint_state.name[4] ="f2_finger_topjoint";
60  joint_state.position[4] = top_rotation;
61  joint_state.name[5] ="f3_finger_topjoint";
62  joint_state.position[5] = top_rotation;
63  publisher.publish(joint_state);
64  ros::spinOnce();
65 }
66 
67 void Gripper::spin() {
68 
69  // Continuously update the joint positions
70  ros::Rate loop(5);
71  while(ros::ok()) {
72  update_joints(current_base_joint_pos, current_top_joint_pos);
73  loop.sleep();
74  }
75 
76 }
77 
78 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
79  ros::init(argc, argv, "cylinder");
80 
81  Gripper gripper;
82  gripper.spin();
83 
84  return 0;
85 }
